item.title: Nvidia’s stock nears a ‘death cross.’ Should investors be worried?
item.description: The last two bearish crossovers led to further sharp selloffs, but there are some differences in the stock’s chart this time.

item.title: UBS lifts gold price forecast after metal tops $3,000
item.description: UBS’s chief investment office has lifted its gold price forecast to $3,200 from $3,000, saying it could reach that threshold by June.

item.title: ‘This woman destroyed my heart and soul’: After my wife died, her mother turned on me — and presented me with a secret will
item.description: “She flipped a switch and instantly my wife’s entire family hated me.”

item.title: This sector may be the ‘accidental beneficiary’ of a U.S. growth scare, says JPMorgan
item.description: Emerging markets may be helped by a weaker dollar and lower U.S. interest rates

item.title: The U.S. growth outlook was just cut by the OECD on uncertainty and tariffs
item.description: The U.S. economic growth outlook — and even more so, Canada’s and Mexico’s — was lowered on Monday by the Organization for Economic Cooperation and De...
